storyInfo: Avdotya's speech reaches the hearts of the people of Zeruertza. Gavial goes to see Stitch, who is suffering under the pressure to catch up to his teacher. He once again chooses to run.

attributes.content: Ahem. Citizens of Zeruertza, I am your environment and climate representative, Edge Eartheart.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: We are here today to discuss the future of Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: The survey results are back, and the representatives have discussed a few possible solutions. We will make our choice from these options today.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: We also hope to come up with an answer for how the city will move forward.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: However, today's meeting will be officiated by Avdotya.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Are you sure about this, Avdotya?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Sure, you've lived in Zeruertza for quite a while, and the people in town know you. But this is the first time you'll be standing before everyone, right?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Alright, you're up, Avdotya.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: I might take some time, Master Edge. Is that okay?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Don't worry, you won't break my record of putting half the city to sleep.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: I've never heard that story.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, I remember. Master Eartheart went into a long discourse about geology.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: He went on and on until the sun went down, and only stopped when he wore himself out.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I probably won't go THAT long.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Go, Avdotya. This is the culmination of the time you spent here as our resident surface-born.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Thank you. Here goes.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: It's Avdotya!
attributes.name: Voice from Far Away

attributes.content: Avdotya! I'm with you, no matter what you say!
attributes.name: Voice from Far Away

attributes.content: Why don't my speeches get the same reception?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: It's not just your record-breaking speech. All the other meetings you officiate last for ages.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: I know you're always the first to fall asleep.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Not today. Avdotya looks different this time. What does she have on her mind?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Fantastic. I respect Master Edge's knowledge, but his meetings are torturous.
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: Avdotya's voice is as beautiful as she is. I could listen to her all day.
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Greetings, citizens of Zeruertza. I am Avdotya, literature representative.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Today, I officiate over this meeting that will determine Zeruertza's future.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: We have discussed with Master Edge and believe that there are three practical plans to carry out Zeruertza's evacuation.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Before discussing the plans, however, there's something else that I want to talk about.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: It's about my past.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Not the past of Avdotya Razorpen, but the past of Avdotya Nikolayevna Ivanova.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: When I first came to live among the Durins, I created many stories, and shared mine with many people.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: This, however, I've never told anyone.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I want to share it with you today.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I was born to a noble family in Ursus.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Avdotya thought she would struggle to find words.
But she found her memories pouring out as soon as she opened her mouth.
It was not that she did not know what to say; it was that she had too much to say and did not know where to start.
The Durins do not know what it means for her. But she does.
This is the first time she's looked back on her past since coming to the Durins.
She thought time would let the past fade, let her forget that she was once a woman of Ursus.
Now, though, she realizes that the past never truly goes away.
But meeting Gavial and the people she brought with her helps her realizeâ€”
That is not so bad.
The past pulls her down bit by bit, along with the Durins listening to her story.
But she no longer feels pain from it, and thus neither do the Durins.
Stitch sits in his room, trying not to think about it.
But he can't help it.
He knows this is his last chance.
Let it go, and he will never surpass his teacher.
And he has a feeling that if he does not win this time, he will always be second-best, though to what he cannot describe.
He knows.
But he can't do it.
He puts his arms around his head.
Knock knock.
There is someone knocking on his door.
Stitch, you're here, right?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I know you're in there.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Leave me alone, Gavial!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: We need to talk.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Talk to Catch if this is about the dome.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: No can do.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Because this is your job.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Open the door.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're not coming in here!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That's not up to you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: The door and the walls around it collapse with a bang, and Gavial walks in casually holding her great axe.
She sees Stich sitting by the desk with his arms around his head, his expression hidden.
A few blank pieces of paper lie by his hand.
A few more pieces of paper lie by his feet, either torn to pieces or crumpled up.
Design sketches for the dome.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You wanted to do it, didn't you?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Can't you give me a break, Gavial?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: It's not so much that I'm not giving you a break...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Look at you, shutting yourself in this room staring at sketches, holding in everything you're thinking.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're the one who's not giving yourself a break, Stitch.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You don't know anything...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Right, which is why I'm not taking you back by force.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I don't know. So I gotta find out.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Why did you smash my door then?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You wouldn't have talked if I didn't.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're just threatening me...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I'm a reasonable woman. I could even be convinced to help you, if you have a good enough reason.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I realized something, on my way over here
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You weren't happy with the whole dome repair thing, were you? From the very beginning?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Life on the surface can be so colorful. I never heard Avdotya talk about it... right, Master Edge?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Huh? Mm.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: It's nothing. Rare to see you drift off like this, though. What's the matter?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I was thinking about Stitch.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Stitch? Aren't Gavial and Catch looking for him? Ought to be fine, right?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: The question isn't fine or not.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Seeing him today made me realize I may have pushed him too hard without realizing.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: You're talking about the dome repair?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Of course, I was in agreement about not repairing the dome.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: But I was also anxious about the broken survey equipment.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: You know how Stitch has been since his teacher went missing.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: He submitted a series of proposals for the dome that got rejected. At some point he stopped coming to design meetings, shuttering up in his room.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: I thought I could push him a little... if he could come up with a new plan to repair the dome, it would be an opportunity to bring it up.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: I could help him.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: He ended up going up to get surface-dwellers to fix the railway.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Yeah, I didn't expect him to go this far to avoid fixing the dome.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: So I thought, forget it, the Originium vein takes priority.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: If he's so reluctant to repair it, just let it be; there will be more chances in the future.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Little did I know there would be no more chances.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: This isn't your fault. If anything, it's Stitch's for running away.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: But if this dome is so important to himâ€”
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: He'll regret it for the rest of his life, if he doesn't seize the opportunity.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Why are you so against repairing the dome?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Because of the job my teacher left me.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Teacher? Job? Didn't Catch say your teacher went missing?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It wasn't... a sudden disappearance.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Though he didn't tell anyone else, he did leave me an assignment.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I have to win everyone over with my dome design, and make the dome of Zeruertza my own.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Only then will he come back to find me.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Otherwise, he'll never come back.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Your last name is Canvas too. Are you related?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No, I changed it later.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Eight years ago, I survived an Originium vein explosion. I had no home to return to, but my teacher took me in.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: So your Oripathy...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes, that was when I caught it.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: On the surface, people with this disease are called the Infected and cast out from society.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That's not the case among the Durins, but we can't fully cure it, only keep its symptoms in check.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: It's the same up there.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So I changed my name to that of my mentor and studied architecture under him.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I hear he was pretty famous?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Of course! Finch Canvas was the design representative of Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Surface-dwellers would call our style 'minimalist'.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: We oppose elaborate and flashy designs, seeing them as the unchecked spread of desire, the product of a slothful life.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: At this rate, we will inevitably be swallowed up by our own desire.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That's why we advocate a lifestyle that emphasizes the true nature of things.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: True nature?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: How things are in their most natural state. We oppose all unnecessary functions, trying to keep things the way they are.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: This is our rebellion against a life of desire.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Like the simple design of your room?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No, my style is not exactly the same as that of my teacher.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: My style came from his, but in some ways, we go in opposite directions.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Allowing the city to welcome destruction while looking its best is a luxury that comes only from our excess productivity. It is arrogant and wasteful.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: One's time is limited, and my clock is ticking!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You're Infected too, Gavial. Don't you understand?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You only have so much time left. You need to spend your efforts on something more meaningful.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Of course. That's why I study medicine, so I can heal myself and people like me.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But if that's how you feel, why not seize this last chance?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You think I don't want to?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Do you see the sketches here?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: They are proof of my failure over the years!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I made proposal after proposal, only to see all of them rejected!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: After that, I couldn't even come up with a passable sketch.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I don't know who is the problem: the Zeruertzans, or me.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: All I know is that the mere sight of the dome fills me with fear.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: It's like a cage that my teacher has locked me in, trapping me forever.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Even if it's my last chance.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I can't do it anymore!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Even if I came up with a new plan, there's no hope of it getting through.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: And you tell me how I'm going to come up with a new plan that can pass review in such a short time?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I'm not coming with you, Gavial.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I'm a failure.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Tell Master Edge that if he wants the dome fixed, he can have Catch do it.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: He'll undoubtedly do a better job than I can.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Alright, I get it now.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: All the more important for you to come with me.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Haven't you been listening?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But you're the one who's got to explain it to the gang.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Stitch is in danger. Stitch is in danger.
attributes.name: Strange Machine A

attributes.content: Protect Stitch. Protect Stitch.
attributes.name: Strange Machine B

attributes.content: Hey, where did these bots come frâ€”
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Gavial
